nodes.description: Edge router acting as the primary ingress point into the enterprise network. Discovery starts here.
Aggregation switch connecting edge routing to application-facing components.
API gateway routing incoming requests to downstream services.
Order management service handling non-payment workflows.
Business-critical service on the checkout path. Any degradation directly impacts transactions.

edges.description: Ingress traffic flows from edge router to aggregation switch.
Traffic forwarded from network layer to application gateway.
Order-related requests routed to Order Service.
Payment requests routed to Payment Service (critical path).
